definition: scattered/loose/to come loose/to fall apart/leisurely/powdered medicine
to scatter/to break up (a meeting etc)/to disperse/to disseminate/to dispel/(coll.) to sack

sentences.english: The slightest movement will defocus the microscope.
sentences.chinese: 最輕微的運動都會使顯微鏡散焦。

sentences.english: A new method for depth measurement of mobile object based on defocus images was proposed. …
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種基於散焦圖像移動目標深度測量的方法。

sentences.english: A new method for depth measurement based on defocus images was proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了基於散焦圖像深度測量的一種新方法。

sentences.english: A new method for depth from defocus images is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種基於散焦圖像計算景物距離的新方法。

sentences.english: In this paper, out-of-focus image restoration processing of the magnetic particle testing system is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 討論熒光磁粉探傷系統散焦圖像復原處理問題。

sentences.english: In the image degradation model, uniform defocusing blurring is a common kind of model.
sentences.chinese: 在圖像退化模型中，均勻散焦模糊是一種常見模型。

sentences.english: Motion blur and defocus blur are the common blur types which degrade image.
sentences.chinese: 運動模糊和散焦模糊是常見的兩種圖像模糊類型。

sentences.english: A new method to measure the optical defocus of a passive imaging system (ODPIS) is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種測量被動成像系統光學散焦的新方法。
